Parse a string into a rfc822 address list.

parse_address_list.Rd

EBNF at http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2822#section-3.4

Usage

parse_address_list(x)

Arguments

x

string to parse

Value

a list of addresses

Examples

parse_address_list("<a@b.com> Alison, <c@d.com> Colin")
#> <a@b.com>,
#>   <c@d.com>
